Vulnerability.Title: FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer Persistent XSS vulnerability

cvrf:Acknowledgment.cvrf:Description: Fortinet is pleased to thank Vulnerability Lab for reporting a FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer vulnerability under responsible disclosure. Ã‚Â

cvrf:Note.#text: An XSS vulnerablity in FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer could allow privileged guest user accounts and restricted user accounts to inject malicious script to the application-side or client-side of the appliance web-application; this potentially enables XSS attacks.

An XSS vulnerablity in FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer could allow privileged guest user accounts and restricted user accounts to inject malicious script to the application-side or client-side of the appliance web-application; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
